user_query: I'm organizing a team-building retreat for my company and I need your guidance.

TaskList.description: Scrape the latest news articles about successful team-building activities and exercises.
Compile a list of popular team-building games and challenges.
Suggest unique food and drink options for the retreat.
Find a suitable venue in a serene location for the retreat.
Combine the information from the news articles, team-building games, food options, and venue suggestions to create a comprehensive plan for the retreat.
